title: ‘People just aren't applying': Why the restaurant industry created no new jobs last month
text:
14 dividend stocks from a winning value manager as the broader market hits record highs

These stocks have yields that are at least twice those of 10-year Treasury notes and plenty of upside potential, according to John Buckingham, editor of the Prudent Speculator. See full story.

Coming fixes to Social Security and Medicare are going to hurt

There are a few ways to fix our entitlement mess -- none of them are pretty See full story.

My in-laws want to sell us their home for $100,000, so that we can fix and flip it. Should we refinance our mortgage to pay for this?

'We can refinance our home for 15 years — we currently have eight years left on our mortgage — to purchase and fix their home.' See full story.

Apple is playing a shell game with its App Store changes, but that can't last forever

Apple nibbles around the corners of its massive App Store business to appease developers and regulators, all while trying to maintain its hefty fees in the biggest markets such as video games. See full story.
